id.description: The unique identifier of the segment.

contact_count.description: The total number of contacts in the segment.

sample_updated_at.description: The date and time when the sample contacts in the segment were last updated.

next_sample_update.description: The date and time for the next scheduled sample update of the segment.

created_at.description: The date and time when the segment was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the segment was last updated.

parent_list_id.description: The identifier of the parent list to which the segment belongs.
